title: Les bergers Ecossais (The Scottish Shepherds)
medium:
Medium: cotton plain weave on top, n linen plain weave on back, with cotton wadding between.
Printed by engraved plate
description:
Valance (cut edge at left)  made of pieces printed fabric and quilted.
Some pieces also mounted on the back. 
Front faded, back less so.
Scenes of Scottish peasant life.
name: Valance
